title: 看门狗报错问题，求解~~~
author: 辉
txt_content:
[00:30:46 INFO]: [举报] 玩家your_h被举报原因:KillAura
[00:30:46 ERROR]: null

刚开始装的时候还好好的，
我只是改了下语言文件，改了几次，到最后的一会发现了这个
举报后会出现内部错误什么的英语提示。
求解。。。

replies.author: 十年后？
replies.txt_content: 应该是编码问题，不支持某些语言吧

replies.author: 辉
replies.txt_content:
prefix: "&4[&c举报&4] "

# Other messages :P
unknownHacks: "&c举报类型: &eFly&6[飞行]&r, &eKillAura&6[杀戮光环]&r, &eAutoClicker&6[连点器]&r, &eSpeed&6[速度]&r, &eAntiKnockbackp&6[加速]&r, &eReach"
correctUsage: "&c[举报]: &f/wdr (名字) (举报类型)"
playerNotFound: "&c玩家不在线或名字打错,找不到:&e%player%"
thanksForReporting: "&c&lA player has been removed from your game for hacking or abuse. &eThanks for reporting it!"
hackerGotCaught: "&c%player% &bhas been caught and punished. Thanks for your report!"
preventSelfReporting: "&c你不能举报你自己"
playerLoggedOut1: "&c对于&e%player%&c的情况我们已经检查完毕,暂未发现其有作弊行为.&c但相关人员会持续关注他的，感谢你的举报。"
playerLoggedOut2: "&c&lThe player logged out before we could finish analyzing them! Be sure to open a report at our website."
thankPlayerForReport: "&a感谢你的举报,我们会认真核实！"
———————————————
alreadyReported: "&c"              改到这一行的时候出现的问题
———————————————
notEnoughEvidence: "&c&l"

# /wdr <player> <one hack> section
successfulReportOneHack: "&a你举报了:&e%player% &a原因:&e[%hack%]"
broadcaseOneHack: "&a玩家&c%player%&a被举报原因:&e%hack%"
broadcastOneHackBanned: "&c%player% &ahas been banned for &e%hack%"

# /wdr <player> <two hacks> section
successfulReportTwoHacks: "&aYou reported &e%player% &afor &e[%hack1%, %hack2%]"
broadcastTwoHacks: "&c%reporter% &areported &c%player% &afor &e%hack1% &aand &e%hack2%"
broadcastTwoHacksBanned: "&c%player% &ahas been banned for &e%hack1% &aand &e%hack2%"

# /wdr <player> <three hacks> section
successfulReportThreeHacks: "&aYou reported &e%player% &afor &e[%hack1%, %hack2%, %hack3%]"
broadcastThreeHacks: "&c%reporter% &areported &c%player% &afor &e%hack1%&a, &e%hack2% &aand &e%hack3%"
broadcastThreeHacksBanned: "&c%player% &ahas been banned for &e%hack1%&a, &e%hack2% &aand &e%hack3%"
